1.0.0

Release Date April 18, 2016
Plug-In Version 1.0.0
Supported nopCommerce Version 3.50, 3.60, 3.70

Feature

  • Admin mobile number configuration
  • Individual messages to customer from customer edit and order edit pages
  • Multiple provider settings and country wise provider settings
  • Email Sms Api, Http Sms Api, Twilio Voice & Sms Api Configurations
  • Template based messages
  • Customer events
    • Mobile number verification
    • Order placed
    • Shipment initiated
    • Order delivered
    • Order cancelled
    • Order note added
    • Order processing
    • Payment refund
  • Admin events
    • New customer registration
    • New order placed in store
Mobile App Development
Theme Design & Development
Customization Service
AI/ML Development
